top_comments.comment: Hey Ren, the white concrete powder gives a white sand / white dessert kind of vibe which really adds to the sci-fi feel in my opinion! I like it a lot
So other hermits know where to pay make the item frams invisible so they see the barrels
Lol I love how Ren is STILL rocking his Blue Shades from last seasons Button Game... xD

comments_since_last_sample.body: Issue is the barrels are hidden behind the picture frames. Add a second barrel above the prices and change signs to say 'please pay in barrel ABOVE'. add a sign at each end portal to say 'octagon change....please pay in barrel above prices'
So other hermits know where to pay make the item frams invisible so they see the barrels
Put a diamond fliter below all products to a central chest
Nice video hope you win for the 13 November championship 🥰😍

"The sign's made of unoxidised copper so it will change from orange to green"
Not while Scar has an axe and 10 minutes to spare
